titles.title: Lord, Lord, Lord You've surely been good to me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord, Lord, Lord
You've surely been
good to me; (3x)
You have done what
this world could not do.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You saved my soul
when I was lost
You've surely been
good to me; (3x)
You have done what
this world could not do.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You filled me with the
Holy Ghost,
You've surely been
good to me; (3x)
You have done what
this world could not do.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You healed my body
when I was sick,
You've surely been
good to me; (3x)
You have done what
this world could not do.
